website_summaries.verdict: The most audibly and technologically impressive speaker in UE’s roster, but the quality of a MEGABLAST speaker isn’t cheap.
pros: The MEGABLAST features Amazon Alexa support, incredibly loud, yet clear thundering sound
Sports the deepest bass of any UE speaker
Connects to Wi-Fi or Bluetooth for music streaming services like Spotify, iHeart Radio, Amazon Music, etc
cons: At $250, the MEGABLAST is easily the most expensive speaker available from UE

customer_reviews.title: Definitely - Quality issue and support issue - Buy at your own risk!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The device sound well for a portable speaker. However - the device started drying and not charging after 30 days! I tried the reset as per troubleshooting instructions and it still will not work. Contacted the UE support, which was very hard to get to. They tried to walk me thru similar troubleshooting for not avail. I am told that they will send an email instruction how to capture a video of me troubleshooting so that it can be sent back to them before processing any possible replacement. Until now, the email has not arrived. What a joke! I will not recommend the purchase of this product because the of its short life and support is TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: SMcCord

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth sub par Alexa feature even worse.. don’t buy and waste a lot of money
customer_reviews.text: To big does not work when u put it on its side. Drops connection all the time even from a foot away. Tried it with iPhone 7,8 and 10 same result. Alexa is horrible u basically have to yell if u are more than 3 feet away. Sent it back for another and same result. Companies customer support is horrible. Nothing good to say about except it’s loud and waterproof sound quality is ok I guess but it drops out all the time so it’s horrible
customer_reviews.author: peter t.

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and plenty of volume, but pretty deaf when giving voice commands
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and plenty of loudness. I use the speaker out by the pool and in the yard. It can be heard clearly across the yard and would probably irritate the neighbors if I turned up the volume too much. The only issue is the MegaBlast seems to be hard of hearing. If you have even modest volume playing on the speaker, you pretty much have to shout "Alexa" to get a response from the speaker. Repeatedly shouting "Alexa" is probably more irritating to the neighbors than the music.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Great price but some uncertainty in regards to packaging
customer_reviews.text: The price was great. The order arrived as promised. Opened up the box and all the seals were already broken. All the components looked clean. Ought these to replace the echo plus. The sound is excellent. The first use at the pool was good. Connected using blue tooth. The Alexa commands worked well. The strange thing was when I said next it told me it reached the end of the playlist. It announced it was starting over. The next song wasn’t on the current playlist nor in my library. Looking forward to many hours of listening pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Megablast w/o the portable charger so I was surprised to see the package that said it contained the portable charger. However, when I opened the box there was no portable charger in it. Which is clearly false advertising. Furthermore, someone took off the screw lock that’s normally on the bottom of the speaker. I really would like to return the product but I don’t feel like going through the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A bit redundant.
customer_reviews.text: So it's a great speaker, but if it breaks I dont think I'd buy it again. First off it's really too pretty for me to want to bring it outside so it being waterproof is a bit redundant. Second because it is waterproof and I dont ever take it outside it was a bad buy due to the lowered sound quality you could expect from any waterproof speaker. Also the alexa is kinda trash in this speaker, but only because it doesn't have all the features of a real Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiak

customer_reviews.title: The reason for the low overall rating is unit stopped working 8 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the unit. There were issues at times with the connectivity. The reason for the low overall rating is the unit stopped working 8 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Belcher

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, amazing sound quality, light weight, great for filling my house with music, or a portable speaker. I drove my old car across the country, WA State to MS, and it was my source of music, 16 hours is an understatement. I only gave it a 4/5 due to the previous model has a ton of features while this one has a handful. I think they will get more features eventually, but as of now that is the ONLY flaw. I reviewing this only after mine stopped working. It just stopped randomly and wont charge after multiple troubleshooting attempts. Even with this inconvenience i still love my speaker and will still recommend it, highly.
customer_reviews.author: jordan floyd

customer_reviews.title: Practically Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: I set it up last night. Charged it and put it through its paces. Great sound worked like a charm. This morning it was shut off. It will NOT turn on. The indicator light shows that it is charged. Holding the power button will not power it. I went to t he support page on the website and followed the instructions for a reset -- nothing. I have now read other reviews and see that this is not an isolated incident. I do not understand how a device simply shuts off and will not allow itself to be restarted. I selected this over many other choices (including Bose and JBL). I hope t hat this was not a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ettinger

customer_reviews.title: They Removed The Charging Dock & Screw-In Clip
customer_reviews.text: I love the UE Megablast to the point that I bought 2 of them. The sound quality is excellent. Unlike my old JBL Charge 3, the mids and highs are crisp and clear. It also has plenty o' low-end. The Charge 3 was muddy and indistinct. It might have been suitable for a kid who only listens to Hip-Hop and EDM but I'm a grown-@ss-man. The UE Megablast can handle that boom-bap nonsense too. But, it can also handle the likes of Miles Davis and Bill Evans with surprising fidelity. I was going to buy a Bose Revolve+ but the UE Megablast actually sounded a
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best Speaker hands down.
customer_reviews.text: This is the FORTH UE Boom product I have purchased. I got the UE MegaBoom as a gift for my best friend and sister. I purchased the UE Wonderboom for my classroom and I got this UE MegaBlast for my apartment. I love that it has Alexa. I actually have started using it. The speaker is VERY loud and super water proof. I use it in the shower. My place is small so I don't need to turn it up much to hear it from everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Manifa S.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck & Super LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible speaker, especially for its size! Beware: I previously purchased via third party instead of via Amazon as the seller. DO NOT DO THIS. Many refurbished and some even new have major issues after a few months so do your research first and buy fro Amazon (as the actual seller). That said, knowing Amazon has my warranty back, I purchased several and if you enjoy high quality, waterproof, LOUD, bluetooth speakers..this is your best bet!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Horrible Multi Speaker Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: When they work these speakers are very good. I’ve spent HOURS with the MEGABOOM help team attempting to “Create a Group” with my four MEGABOOM speakers. 9 our of 10 times they simply won’t recognize each other in order to synchronize to function as four speakers connected to my iPad. I would definitely not purchase these speakers if your goal is to use 2 or more MEGABOOM speakers at the same time. It’s just a bad product in that way.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Rammer

customer_reviews.title: I have two megaboom speakers, and I also have the UE Megablast as well.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best UE Megablast speaker of all the ones, that I own great sound, deep bass, terrific midrange.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Missing item, wrong color speaker received
customer_reviews.text: To start I do have another ultimate ears speaker so that’s why I ordered the megablast. We love our boom, but it’s not loud enough in the shop at work. I ordered the red Megablast and received a blue megablast instead. I also received no screw on the bottom of the unit which is extremely disappointing. I expect you to at least make sure my items have everything and are correct before shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker with a small Alexa issue
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. We bought this to use with Bluetooth and as an Alexa device. After several weeks, it stopped doing Alexa routines. Everything else with Alexa works fine. I contacted Amazon support who sent me to Logitech support. They were polite and tried several things but couldn’t resolve the problem. It is a great speaker. I hope soon pairing will be possible.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Keeps disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: Like some other reviewers said I had problems with it playing a full song without disconnecting....it will at least disconnect once or twice every song...very disappointing...although it’s updated to the latest firmware , I have an older UE and never had an issue with it ....so this one seems defective,it’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: Mine that I bought a year ago keeps cutting out when I stream on amazon music. been tryin to get logitech to send me a replacement for 4 weeks now. They insist I keep doing hours of troubleshooting. I'm thinking who manufactured this product anyway. All they neeed to do but they don't want to back their product worth a darn is send me a return label I'll ship it to them and they can troubleshoot the problem.
customer_reviews.author: iamspartacus23

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I received my UE megablast and no D ring inside the box , it says in the user manual that it comes with it , but I don't have it , now I cannot charge my speaker with the power dock , very expensive device and no parts to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker, but the battery was a problem
customer_reviews.text: The speaker quality itself was fine. It had a high top end on volume and the sound quality was good, if a little too bottom heavy. The battery life was never good, and degraded rather quickly for a year before the battery completely refused to charge and the speaker was rendered unusable. On top of that, the app is utterly useless, and the software updates sometimes caused significant connectivity problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for quality audio and Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: Particularly disappointed in the sound quality which lacks any low end underpinning. The mic has a difficult time recognizing voices over music or from a distance so that you have to shout, and there’s no audible confirmation to show your command was heard. I expected more from such a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity is horrible.  Unit turns on and off at random all day long.
customer_reviews.text: This does have good sound; when it works. When connected to the phone even two inches away, the connections drop, sound crackles, and cuts out. Battery life is about 6 hours. Tried to contact support but, with COVID and such, PIA. Waste of money at $150. Better speakers out there for 1/3 the price. Hoping this review can help me make some traction on getting the product fixed.
customer_reviews.author: JGL

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate rocks.
customer_reviews.text: I have all sorts of wireless speakers and this one blew me away. Setup was simple and weatherproof was tested in the pool. We jammed all night poolside and in the pool. Ultimate seems to actually be the ultimate speaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: JpO

customer_reviews.title: Put stock in negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: I discounted the bad Amazon reviews for this item and reaped the consequences- Megablast stopped working after the first day. Everything was working fine and then just stopped despite being connected and recognized by my IPhone. Also picked up my text and other notifications even when shut off.
customer_reviews.author: william w. hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Terrible bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I connected it to 1 phone and have not been able to connect it to anything since, even while turning off the bluetooth of my phone and my actual phone off. Otherwise its a great speaker but its missed a lot of potential.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Berges

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound but Very Quirky and cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: Product came with no user guide- just a quick set-up. No details about features, set-up or anything useful. It's completely hooked to Alexa - which has issues if you have other Alexa devices. It's considered a portable device, but by dfault , it shuts off after 15 minutes to save the battery. The charging outlet is very, very quirky and akward- you can tell its designed by soeone trying to appeal to esthetics rather than simple, durable fucntion. I will be returning the device and order a speaker that is truly portable, great sound and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, even when going tubing down the river!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it sounds and the fact that it has Alexa built in. I was even able to use my iPhone with it (using Alexa) while tubing down the river. It's waterproof and looks great to boot. Best speaker choice I've ever made. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Bailey

customer_reviews.title: portable great sound
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an ALexa compatible speaker that was water proof and would not break easily. This is prefect. I did not read the description closely and ordered the dock to charge it. However there was one with it. Love that I don't have to worry about cords.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Wojtas

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: The speaker has seen salt water, the bottom of a pool, and even gets thrown in the hot tub on occasion. For the size, it produces quality sound. Alexa is a handy feature to have included. I take this on weekend trips, and I use it for maybe 20 hours without having to bring a charger along.
customer_reviews.author: Trust me

customer_reviews.title: Very little mid-range.  Deal-breaker for me.
customer_reviews.text: Nice hardware design (though no volume control on unit). Decent bass, somewhat over-the-top highs, and very little mid-range combine to produce a hollow sound. Not worth the money, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Big Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Best modern portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to the pool and dropped it in, still works. had a megaboom for 4 years and this is a great upgrade
customer_reviews.author: John Ammon

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Use it all over the place, home, work, gym it works great sounds awesome and the battery is great. Comes with everything but a case but I found one one here that works great for this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: SMA

customer_reviews.title: I Love UE and Recommend It
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and this makes like the 4th UE Speaker I have purchased. We use this all the time outside and it still works great. It runs all the time either outside or on the dock in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Ray Forrest

customer_reviews.title: No support for multi room audio
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a device that supports full Alexa functionality but still has great sound quality SKIP THIS SPEAKER. It does not support multi room audio and you’re much better off finding something that does.
customer_reviews.author: Null

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: The sound from this speaker is amazing and the portability makes it easy to take your music anywhere. The only downside is that there is little direction on how to set it up and sync it with your music device. But once you get that figured out, it's really great.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but frustrating function
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great...when it works. Functionality needs improvement. Some of the issues: **When I'm able to pair it with a device, it shuts down after 10-15 minutes. Re-pairing required. **It sometimes pair when not prompted. ie: shut down the connection from my phone. 2 minutes later it repairs. Shutting down the MEGA does no good. It powers up and re-pairs. Only solution is to shut down bluetooth on the device. **Volume control is very erratic. Hope these improve with updates.
customer_reviews.author: cindygirl63

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: We liked the speaker so much that we ordered another one. We use it around the pool and it is very easy to use and has a great sound. It is very simple to operate and is easy to connect via bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ree86

customer_reviews.title: Very Good (not great), sound, volume. It is the choice portable speaker if you really want Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it integrates Alexa. I will give it five stars if it had the possibility to turn it on and off remotely like the UE Boom and could be paired with other UE speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel (Mike) Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Streaming directly to speaker via Alexa music randomly stops and starts.
customer_reviews.text: When streaming music directly to the speaker via Alexa the sound will randomly stop and start. VERY ANNOYING. Works fine when going through Bluetooth. Received this 2 months ago and performed initial set up, running firmware 3.2.200. Amazon support advised this is an Ultimate Ears issue. Speaker is close to router, so that is not an issue. I bought this unit because the sound is awesome but if you are not linked through Bluetooth, expect to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Speaker But....
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality, the loudness, and the battery life is perfect totally worth the price. However sometimes my speaker will glitch out for example: If i put my phone in my pocket and carry the speaker it will cut out then play with really fast skips. I also believe this can happen if my speaker is full volume. I'm not really sure on what this is exactly but it uncommonly happens and it's pretty embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and portable!
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of sound, ease of setup, portability and it's water proof. So, this is the device to have around the pool and hot tub, or out in the snow. Logitech is know to release early (unlike Apple), so software updates will need to further mature this product (as has been pointed out in other reviews). It works well out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Word to any future buyers wanting to buy a used speaker. Mine stopped working after just 2 mos. I called the megablast company which was a no go. Communication was through email only and that was terrible. I bought the speaker in August of this year and company is saying it’s out of warranty. Such a rip off. I am so angry with amazon and Megablast for selling me a crap product $200 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking speaker. Not much bass to it compared to my echo plus from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker however I expected more of a deep bass tone. Works well with Alexa too. Maybe I should have gotten the mega boom.
customer_reviews.author: ThinBlueLine_JKU

customer_reviews.title: Ok but annoying!!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good alexa cant hear you when it's on unless your on top of it like inches away...everytime I touch my phone the music goes off n I have to restart it!! I find it very annoying!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at a Youth Baseball or Soccer Game!!!

Other parents show up with that speaker box that you roll around and this megablast is way louder. I went to Home Depot and bought this Velcro Hook for it and just hang it from either a fence or portable canopy. And this is not even mentioning that I use it as a portable Alexa when I'm at my house.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a small device
customer_reviews.text: I use this around the yard and deck. There's only one negative thing about this device.....it has a tendency to disconnect while playing music.....it stops for about 10 to 20 seconds, then comes back on....
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Silkowski

customer_reviews.title: Buy Bose same price better quality!!
customer_reviews.text: $200 dollar portable speaker and it won’t stay connected my phone, this was a terrible buy and I should have learned lesson with a megaboom I bought before this. The app they have also is terrible and doesn’t work don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Issues and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well for 3 or 4 weeks. Then started having trouble charging on the dock then would not turn on. Googled the issue and found directions on how to do a factory reset. Nothing happened. Sent 2 emails to ultimate ears support and no response. Call center is closed due to Covid. When it was working the Alexa feature was Sub par... You had to yell for it to activate even if right beside it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor internet connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, poor connectivity with the internet, it’s spotty at best. Sometimes it will work ok for 30 minutes then just stops. The speaker also does not hear as well as other Alexa items.

customer_reviews.title: Its sound quality rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I love it nothing here disappoints! Thanks to who ship to me

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to internet...........customer service is terrible

There is supposed to be a 2 year warranty, I have had the speaker for 9 months and want my money back.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good for a portable!
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have two and get a stereo effect. This speaker sounds much better than my prior Bose portable as well as is able to go louder. Good product!

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not as advertised

customer_reviews.title: very happy I bought this

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work nearly as well as its predecessor the megaboom
customer_reviews.text: Terrible dark red color and it just doesn't work nearly as well in syncing up like the Megaboom. Sucks. I hate it.

customer_reviews.title: You must get one!

customer_reviews.title: Good sound

Color:Merlot| Style:w/o Charging DockMeet Ultimate Ears MEGABLAST, our most powerful portable Wi-Fi/Bluetooth speaker with big, bassy 360° sound and hands-free voice control. Now with Amazon Alexa built-in, you and your crew can blast tunes, discover new music, order takeout, and more, with just the power of your voice. Do it all at home or on-the-go, even take calls without killing the music whenever connected to Wi-Fi or a mobile hotspot. MEGABLAST is waterproof, rugged, and stunning too — go from cocktail party to the pool party with confidence and style. Just say it to play it with MEGABLAST from Ultimate Ears.

• Enjoy intensely rich 360° sound, stunning clarity, and heart-pounding bass wherever you go
• Control your music hands-free through far-field voice recognition and Amazon Alexa built-in
• Up to 330 ft / 100 m range on Wi-Fi and 150 ft / 45 m on Bluetooth lets you move around freely
• MEGABLAST is IP67 rated and can be immersed in water up to 1 m for 30 minutes
• Add new features as they become available through the Ultimate Ears app

ULTIMATE SOUND - Our biggest, loudest, and most beautiful speaker yet, Ultimate Ears MEGABLAST is insanely powerful. Blasting 360° intensely rich sound with stunning clarity and deep, heart-pounding bass, this Wi-Fi/Bluetooth speaker will bring your music to life in its full glory wherever you take it. 

ULTIMATE VOICE CONTROL - Ultimate Ears MEGABLAST comes with hands-free Amazon Alexa built right in. Just ask Alexa to blast tunes, discover new music, crank the volume, find new restaurants -–or try any of Alexa’s crazy skills. Use Alexa anywhere your speaker goes, all you need is Wi-Fi or a mobile hotspot. 

THE MUSIC NEVER STOPS - Ultimate Ears MEGABLAST brings Wi-Fi to the portable speaker party and connects directly to the cloud. Enjoy fast, seamless music streaming and a bigger range to roam and dance. Anyone can DJ. And even take calls without stopping the music and killing the vibe. 

SERIOUSLY WATERPROOF AND VIRTUALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE - Ultimate Ears MEGABLAST is rugged and seriously waterproof. Never worry about going easy on it. From the shower to the pool party, the summer BBQ to the winter slopes–your music will always be on point.
